Kyle Halladay

Home || Archive || Games || Graphics || About Me

Published Games

Block Academy


An augmented reality puzzle game for iOS. Users must assemble blocks according to blueprints that appear over a marker. Unity3D and Vuforia.


Bird Flew


A gyroscope controlled avoidance game for iOS, built with cocos2D. Features seeking and fleeing ai behaviours.


WordGhoul


A word game for iOS featuring procedurally generated levels and dynamically scaled difficulty. Built entirely in OpenGLES.




Other Projects

S


A first-person abstract puzzle game, built for the Swedish Game Awards with Unity3D.


Synapse


Built for 1 Game a Month. Abstract platformer featuring procedural audio and lots of odd visual effects. Unity3D and Pure-Data (for audio)


Haiku Roller


Built for 1 Game a Month. A minimal marble rolling game featuring procedurally generated levels. Ogre3D and Bullet Physics.
